statements: SELECT * FROM ComplianceMonitoring WHERE company_name = 'ABC Corp'
SELECT company_name, certification_status FROM ComplianceMonitoring WHERE certification_status = TRUE
SELECT * FROM ComplianceMonitoring WHERE standard_compliance LIKE '%ISO%'
SELECT company_name, last_inspection_date FROM ComplianceMonitoring ORDER BY last_inspection_date DESC
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_compliance FROM ComplianceMonitoring WHERE certification_status = TRUE
SELECT * FROM ComplianceMonitoring WHERE certification_status = TRUE;
SELECT company_name, standard_compliance, certification_status FROM ComplianceMonitoring WHERE standard_compliance LIKE '%ISO%';
SELECT * FROM ComplianceMonitoring WHERE last_inspection_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT company_name, standard_compliance FROM ComplianceMonitoring ORDER BY company_name ASC;
SELECT id, company_name, standard_compliance FROM ComplianceMonitoring ORDER BY standard_compliance DESC, company_name ASC;
SELECT standard_name, compliance_level FROM ComplianceStandards;
SELECT certification_name, expiry_date FROM CertificationStatus WHERE compliance_status = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM ComplianceStandards WHERE standard_id = 1;
SELECT certification_name, certification_body FROM CertificationStatus WHERE expiry_date >= '2022-12-31';
SELECT standard_name, description, compliance_level FROM ComplianceStandards WHERE compliance_level = 'High';
SELECT * FROM ComplianceStandards WHERE compliance_level = 'High';
SELECT standard_id, standard_name FROM ComplianceStandards ORDER BY standard_name DESC;
SELECT certification_name, certification_body FROM CertificationStatus WHERE expiry_date > '2023-12-31';
SELECT standard_name, description FROM ComplianceStandards WHERE standard_id > 5 AND compliance_level = 'Medium';
SELECT certification_name, compliance_status FROM CertificationStatus WHERE certification_body LIKE '%ISO%'
SELECT * FROM compliance_standards;
SELECT id, standard_name, compliance_level FROM compliance_standards ORDER BY standard_name DESC;
SELECT company_name, standard_name, compliance_status FROM company_compliance WHERE compliance_status='Compliant';
SELECT certification_name, issuing_body, valid_until FROM certifications WHERE valid_until > '2022-12-31';
SELECT company_name, compliance_status FROM company_compliance JOIN compliance_standards ON company_compliance.standard_id = compliance_standards.id;
SELECT company_name, compliance_status FROM company_compliance WHERE standard_id=1 ORDER BY company_name DESC;
SELECT standard_name, description FROM compliance_standards WHERE id=3;
SELECT certification_name, issuing_body, valid_until FROM certifications WHERE valid_until > '2023-01-01';
SELECT company_name, compliance_status FROM company_compliance WHERE certification_id=2 AND compliance_status='Compliant' ORDER BY company_name ASC;
SELECT certification_name, issuing_body FROM certifications WHERE issuing_body LIKE '%ISO%' ORDER BY issuing_body, certification_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM certifications WHERE expiration_date > '2022-12-31';
SELECT name, issuing_authority FROM certifications WHERE issuing_authority LIKE '%ISO%';
SELECT name, description FROM standards ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT c.id, v.description FROM compliance c JOIN violations v ON c.id = v.compliance_id;

SELECT c.id AS compliance_id, s.name AS standard_name, cert.name AS certification_name FROM compliance c JOIN standards s ON c.standard_id = s.id JOIN certifications cert ON c.certification_id = cert.id;
SELECT name, description FROM standards WHERE id = 1;
SELECT name, issuing_authority, expiration_date FROM certifications WHERE id = 5;
SELECT * FROM compliance ORDER BY standard_id DESC;
SELECT violations.description, compliance_id, violation_date FROM violations WHERE id = 3;

SELECT standards.name, certifications.name, violations.description FROM standards JOIN compliance ON standards.id = compliance.standard_id JOIN certifications ON certifications.id = compliance.certification_id;
SELECT * FROM ComplianceStandards;
SELECT id, standard_name, compliance_level FROM ComplianceStandards ORDER BY compliance_level ASC;
SELECT * FROM Certifications WHERE issuance_date <= '2022-01-01';
SELECT certification_name, expiration_date FROM Certifications WHERE expiration_date < '2023-06-01';
SELECT report_name, status FROM ComplianceReports WHERE status = 'Pending';
SELECT * FROM ComplianceStandards WHERE compliance_level = 'High';
SELECT certification_name, issuance_date FROM Certifications WHERE expiration_date > '2023-12-31';
SELECT report_name, status FROM ComplianceReports ORDER BY report_date DESC;
SELECT violation_description, severity_level FROM Violations WHERE violation_type = 'Security';
SELECT log_date, user_id, action FROM AuditLogs WHERE log_type = 'AccessControl' ORDER BY log_date ASC;
